RelatedSentence: Oregon same - sex marriage advocates rejoice as U.S. District Court Judge Michael McShane rules the state 's 10 - year - old ban on gay marriage unconstitutional .
As couples filed into the Melody Ballroom , Stu Rasmussen sat ready to do something he 's waited a while to do .
As couples filed into the Melody Ballroom , Stu Rasmussen sat ready to do something he 's waited a while to do .
Rasmussen , the mayor of Silverton , was poised to perform one of the first legal same - sex marriages in Oregon .
I found the scene particularly poignant because I 've known the trans - gendered Rasmussen for many years .
